full_title: Have The Heart by Post Malone (Ft. Dolly Parton)
title: Have The Heart

description.plain:
“Have The Heart” marks the first collaboration between Post Malone and Dolly Parton. This song was officially released on all streaming platforms on August 16th along with the F-1 Trillion album.

Post Malone and Dolly Parton vocals harmonize while painting a picture of a relationship on its last legs. While the couple knows it’s not working, they can’t seem to let go.

Before revealing the official tracklist for F-1 Trillion, Post Malone teased a collaboration with Dolly Parton in the “Guy For That” music video featuring Luke Combs. In the video, Post is seen wearing a ‘Dolly Parton Fan Club’ hat.
